duties_responsibilities.duty: Overseeing the construction of commercial and industrial projects from start to finish.
Managing and coordinating project managers, superintendents, and developers.
Estimating, scheduling, quality control, progress reporting, billing, design review, and cost reporting.
Participating in proposal meetings, overseeing the buyout process, and selecting subcontractors.
Conducting job site meetings, making sound decisions under tight deadlines, organizing and managing multiple activities.
Evaluating project-related processes, making necessary changes, and meeting/exceeding client expectations.
Maintaining integrity and a constant focus on meeting/exceeding customer requirements and expectations.
Staying up to date on the Construction Market and the newest technology.
Strong Healthcare Project Experience, time management, and organizational skills.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Construction Management or a related field
